extends PolicyImageStorage

    • Method Detail

      • setRetrievalPolicy

        void setRetrievalPolicy(MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy policy)
        Parameters:
        policy - The policy to retrieve the metadata parameters associated with the process.

      • getDefautTitle

        java.lang.String getDefautTitle()
        Returns the default title of this process, used when no title is specified and the process is not used as a sub-process (e.g. the process is used as a plugin)
        Returns:
        The default title of this process metadata, which determines the metadata file name.

      • getConcreteProcessMetaData

        MetaDataSet getConcreteProcessMetaData(java.lang.String metaDataTitle,
                                       MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy policy,
                                       java.lang.String subdir)
        The concrete instance of this has a Concrete MetaData, which contains the specific parameters for this process. This is not to be confused with the returned value of GenericProcess.getConfig(), which contains the (possibly larger or even disjoint) total metadata to be retrieved, including metadata for the children processes.
        Parameters:
        metaDataTitle - Title for the metadata tha determines the metadata file name.
        policy - Policy for retrieval of the metadata (file, dialog box...)
        subdir - Sub-directory of the default process metadata directory in which to look for the metadata.
        Returns:
        The (possibly empty) concrete metadata set instance with the specific parameters used directly by this process.

      • instantiateMetaData

        ModelCore instantiateMetaData(java.lang.String metaDataTitle,
                              MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy policy,
                              java.lang.String subdir)
        Allows to intanciate the metadata set used as parameters for the process
        Parameters:
        metaDataTitle - Title for the metadata tha determines the metadata file name.
        policy - Policy for retrieval of the metadata (file, dialog box...)
        subdir - Sub-directory of the default process metadata directory in which to look for the metadata.
        Returns:
        The instance of the metadata that the process will use.

      • initMetaData

        void initMetaData(java.lang.String metaDataTitle,
                  MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy policy,
                  java.lang.String subdir,
                  ProcessInputOutput.OutputDataKind outputDataKind)
        Allows to initialize and retrieve the metadata once the input image is created. Should at least attempt to retrieve the predefined meatadata of the input image.
        Parameters:
        metaDataTitle - Title of the metaData that determines the metadata file names.
        policy - Policy for retrieval of the metadata (file, dialog box...)
        subdir - Sub-directory of the default process metadata directory in which to look for the metadata.
        outputDataKind - The kind of output in relation to input data (equal reference, copy, etc.)
        See Also:
        It can also be an opportunity to specify the output kind by setting the {@link #m_outputDataKind} attribute if it has to be other than the default {@link OutputDataKind#EqualsInput}., ProcessInputOutput.OutputDataKind
